com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Class Decision

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.Decision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Decision>

    public class Decision
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Decision>
    A single probabilised decision used to construct a particular solution.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Decision(java.lang.String outcome)
      Create a default decision with a probability of 1.0, for a given outcome.
      Decision(java.lang.String outcome, double probability)
      Create the decision corresponding to a particular name.
      Decision(java.lang.String outcome, double score, double probability)
      Create the decision corresponding to a particular name, with a score and probability, for additive scoring systems (e.g.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Decision

        public Decision(java.lang.String outcome,
                double probability)
        Create the decision corresponding to a particular name. This decision will be considered statistical.

      • Decision

        public Decision(java.lang.String outcome)
        Create a default decision with a probability of 1.0, for a given outcome. This decision will not be considered statistical.

      • Decision

        public Decision(java.lang.String outcome,
                double score,
                double probability)
        Create the decision corresponding to a particular name, with a score and probability, for additive scoring systems (e.g. perceptrons). This decision will be considered statistical.

    • Method Detail

      • getOutcome

        public java.lang.String getOutcome()
        A unique code representing this decision's outcome.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        The decision's raw score, for additive scoring systems (e.g. perceptrons).

      • getProbability

        public double getProbability()
        This decision's probability.

      • getProbabilityLog

        public double getProbabilityLog()
        The log of this decision's probability. Avoids calculating the log multiple times.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Decision o)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Decision>

      • getAuthorities

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAuthorities()
        A list of decision authorities which helped to make this decision. Useful when decisions are made by different authorities based on certain criteria - allows us to establish an f-score by authority, as well as analysing errors by authority.

      • addAuthority

        public void addAuthority(java.lang.String authority)
        Add an authority to this decision's list.

      • isStatistical

        public boolean isStatistical()
        Was this decision calculated by a statistical model, or was it made by default, based on rules, etc.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
